panels.description:
Upstream zuul *gate* queue.  The time a given patch will wait before running the upstream gate.

Click on the links below to go to the zuul build status.
panels.title: Upstream Zuul queue

panels.description:
Number of failing upstream *gate* jobs in the last 24 hours.

Click on links below to go to the source zuul builds status.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'gate' AND "passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "job_name" =~ /tripleo-ci.*-up.*/) AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream gate jobs

panels.description: Percentage of upstream  *gate and check* jobs that are passing vs failing vs timing out.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "job_name" =~ /tripleo-ci.*-up.*/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'TIMED_OUT' AND "job_name" =~ /tripleo-ci.*-up.*/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" = 'TIMED_OUT' AND "job_name" =~ /tripleo-ci.*-up.*/) AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream CI stats

panels.description:
A running list of failing upstream *gate* jobs. By default this will show the last 3 days.

Click on individual jobs to go to the logs or to the gerrit change.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "cloud", "region", "result" FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "pipeline" = 'gate' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "job_name" =~ /tripleo-ci.*-up.*/) AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream failing gate jobs

panels.description: This is a place to keep some notes and links to current etherpads for ruck rovers.
panels.title: Useful Links

panels.description:
Running list of all jobs running in the RDO github-check pipeline

Click on individual job names to go to logs or on the patch number to see the gerrit review.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num", "voting" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'github-check') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "project"

panels.title: RDO github-check pipeline

panels.description:
Running list of all jobs running in the RDO github-manual pipeline

Click on individual job names to go to logs or on the patch number to see the gerrit review.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num", "voting" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'github-manual') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "project"

panels.title: RDO github-manual pipeline

panels.description:
Running list of all jobs running in the RDO openstack-periodic-weekend

Click on individual job names to go to logs or on the patch number to see the gerrit review.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num", "voting" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'openstack-periodic-weekend') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "project"

panels.title: RDO openstack-periodic-weekend pipeline

targets.rawSql: SELECT id, status, tag, description, link from rr_bugs where (tag LIKE "%alert%" and tag LIKE "%upgrade%")

panels.title: Upgrade bugs marked "Alert" ( CI team monitoring )

targets.rawSql: SELECT id, status, tag, description, link from rr_bugs where (tag LIKE "%promotion-blocker%" AND tag LIKE "%upgrade%")

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'github-check') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'github-check' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
